name: D'Arta in the rift
description:
PITCH

D'artagnan, proud musketeer, known and recognized by all for not losing any fight and coming out victorious from his missions. However, the character you will play as D'Artagnan has suffered a crushing defeat on his last mission. His soul is destroyed, his reason for living is no more. 

Your character wakes up in an unknown world, a spirit combining modernity and surrealism. Mixing escape game and interaction, your mission will be to interact with the different characters in order to get your hands on the symbol of the musketeer, his hat. A hat representing his world before, his personal identity, his raison d'être.

 Help this historical character to get out of this temporal rift by giving him back his essence and his mode.

 Pay attention to time and character interaction, your mission will be the most important of your life.

GAMEPLAY

In this escape game you'll have to find a way to escape from the dream world in which D'Artagnan finds himself thanks to the various duels that will take place.

You can control the character with the Z/Q/S/D keys, run with Shift and move the camera with the mouse.

THEME

Our themes for this game jam were Escape Game and Musketeer.

LANGUAGE

Only in French
